General.Name: Changchun Faway Automobile Components Co Ltd
General.Description: Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of auto parts in China. The company offers cockpit products, including seat platforms, seat frames, door panels, consoles, headliners, overhead cabinets, instrument panels, and TFT clusters for passenger and commercial vehicles; exterior systems comprising front bumpers, tailgates, spoilers, side aprons, and rearview mirrors; and vision products, such as headlamps, turn signal lamps, and grille lamps. It also provides low carbon products, including body structures, passenger vehicle steel wheels, commercial vehicle tubeless and tube wheels, fuel filter assemblies, and primary and secondary filter element assemblies; and derivative solution comprising remanufacturing lamps, carbon fiber retrofits, engine oils and coolants, wipers, break fluids, oil and air filters, and air conditioning filters. The company was formerly known as Changchun FAW Sihuan Automobile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd in December 2008. Changchun FAWAY Automobile Components Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.
General.Address: No. 1399, Dongfeng South Street, Changchun, China, 130011
